Laarim (Larim, Longarim) ma ọ bụ Narim bụ asụsụ Surmic nke ndị Boya nke Boya Hills nke mba South Sudan na-asụ.
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, a na-asụ Laarim n'obodo nta iri dị n'ebe ugwu Budi County, Eastern Equatoria State
Stirtz (2011) na-akọ na e nwere ihe ruru puku iri abụọ na abụọ ndị na-ekwu okwu, na-ebi n'obodo nta iri na anọ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo Chukudum.
